title: Reality Atom Schema v0.1
description: Single epistemic claim with classification, evidence refs, and optional confidence/validity. Observation-only; no behavior.

claim_id.description: Unique identifier for this claim (e.g. UUID or correlation-based id).

claim.description: The system statement (observed truth, derived state, or declaration of unknown/blind spot).

ts_utc.description: UTC timestamp for when the claim was recorded or the observation was made.

ts_window.description: Optional time window (e.g. ISO interval or label) when the claim or underlying observation is valid.

evidence_refs.description: Paths or URIs to artifacts that support this claim (e.g. telemetry JSON, report paths).

evidence_commands.description: Optional: commands or queries that produced the underlying data (e.g. PowerShell, CIM).

confidence.description: Optional: confidence score for this claim (0â€“1).

validity_scope.description: Optional: scope or conditions under which the claim is valid (e.g. state_observations only, rate_calculations provisional).

notes.description: Optional: free-form notes (e.g. deferral reason, blind spot cause).
